pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract and Tidy Canadian 'Hydrometric' Data // Provides functions to access historical and real-time national 'hydrometric' data from Water Survey of Canada data sources (http://dd.weather.gc.ca/hydrometric/csv/ and http://collaboration.cmc.ec.gc.ca/cmc/hydrometrics/www/) and then applies tidy data principles.
